attributes.action: Police to get stronger means to deal with civic disorder
attributes.additional_details: After numerous civic disturbances in London over the past year it seems our police are powerless to act. Other nations seem to have stronger mechanisms to deal with such criminals with more vigor. Shops & private property have been vandalized as well as police officers injured, it is now time to cast aside human rights worries. So the police should procure items such as tear gas, water cannon and potentially rubber bullets. In order to deter and deal with such occurences if and when they occur again.
